column2: we order the Vegan Queso. It is AMAZING. It tastes like a regular queso. I am not sure of the exact ingredients that makes the queso vegan
column3: but we found tomatoes and caramelized onions in the mix. Order more chips though because they barely give you any. The chips are also very good. For my entree
column4: I ordered the Vegan Taco Salad. It was also very good and consisted of lots of veggies and protein!
